Earned first career win on 4/16/1986...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...

Released by New York (M) on 4/3/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1989 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Toronto to St. Louis on 7/28/1989 (Going to STL: P Brent Gaff, P Vince Horsman, C Tom Pagnozzi, RF Tim Salmon. Going to TOR: P Ken Dayley, P Todd Worrell)...
